channel-type.label: Region switch
channel-type.description: ON in case the device is at specific location, OFF otherwise. This channel is added to the thing at runtime is the region is configured to have a switch for region presence instead of using triggers.

channel-type.label: Local network
channel-type.description: ON in case the device is on the same local network as the openHAB server, OFF otherwise. This channel is added to the thing at runtime if the device IP address is static on the local network. This requires DHCP configuration on the home network router as well.

channel-type.label: Region enter trigger channel
channel-type.description: Trigger channel for entering regions. Payload is the region name. It will be created dynamically at runtime if at least on region configured for device (central or device level configuration) requires a trigger to be fired when entering the region.

channel-type.label: Region leave trigger channel
channel-type.description: Trigger channel for leaving regions. Payload is the region name. It will be created dynamically at runtime if at least on region configured for device (central or device level configuration) requires a trigger to be fired when leaving the region.
